Reviews.Title: “Great Value for the Money”

Reviews.Content: stayed pinch flight canceled rebooked following day looking basic lay head short night jet motel exactly didnt checkin luggage airport clerk helpful directing local convenience store grab essentials nights sleep airport time id recommend looking value airport looked expensive
